name: Clarisse's Bow+
description: Effective against flying foes. If unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions after combat.

refinable.description: Effective against flying foes. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
